T8RIN/ImageToolbox

Image toolbox for cropping, filters, drawing, OCR, and image tweaks

Related repos

  • unified framework for advanced image customization and text-to-image generation
  • Pixel-level image comparison library
  • turns ComfyUI workflows into MCP tools without code, supports text/image/audio/video generation on local or cloud infrastructure
  • OCR utility for copying text from images or videos
  • Notebooks for computer vision tasks like detection, segmentation, and OCR using popular models
  • image management platform with smart conversion, filtering, and device-aware delivery
  • AI tool that turns pixelated faces into realistic high-res images using StyleGAN
  • Cross-platform screen capture tool with OCR
  • Curated list of tools and resources for the AppImage format
